Posts.EditableText:
I'm not sure how many people here use the Interactive Fiction Database, but we're all fans of IF, so it probably makes sense to pass the word: Zarf is running a [survey about the state of the IFDB](https://goo.gl/forms/YWXP1hBMW0DQfahq1) at the ten-year mark, so that plans for the future can be made. If you use the service, or would like to but can't, answering those few questions could help make it better. Thanks for reading.

(More details over [on the other big IF forum](http://www.intfiction.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=23049).)
